title: Site Manager (Civil Engineer) Job at Architrave Nigeria Limited
content:
Architrave Nigeria Limited is a design and build company dedicated to the development of the environment.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Site Manager (Civil Engineer)
Job Location: Ikoyi, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

        


     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Site Manager - Civil Engineer with a building construction bias to join our team.
	The ideal candidate must have extensive experience working on framed projects, specifically on buildings with raft foundation. It is essential that the candidate has previous experience working with a major construction firm.


Key Responsibilities


	Oversee and manage all aspects of the construction site, ensuring that projects are completed on time and within budget
	Coordinate with project managers, engineers, architects, and subcontractors to ensure smooth workflow and communication
	Monitor and enforce compliance with all safety regulations and procedures on the construction site
	Conduct regular site inspections to ensure work is being carried out according to plans and specifications
	Manage and coordinate manpower and equipment resources to maximize efficiency and productivity
	Communicate regularly with stakeholders and provide updates on project progress
	Resolve any issues or conflicts that may arise on the construction site in a timely and effective manner


Qualifications and Required Skills


	Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering or related field
	6 years of proven experience working on high-quality building projects
	Must be COREN registered
	Previous experience working with a major construction firm is a must
	Strong project management and leadership skills
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	Ability to work well under pressure and meet tight deadlines
	Knowledge of construction industry best practices and regulations


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@architrave-ng.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.
